thinking: The page lists multiple packing tape options with prices and 'Add to cart' buttons. I will choose one of the products and add it to the cart to proceed with the purchase.
The item has been successfully added to the cart, as indicated by the 'Added to cart successfully!' notification. The next step is to review the cart and proceed with the purchase.
The cart displays the correct item and subtotal. The next step is to click the 'Proceed to checkout' button to finalize the purchase.

The checkout page requires shipping details and a shipping method to finalize the order. I will first select the standard shipping method (free) and then fill in the required fields (name, phone, address).
Since the page changed after filling in the name, I will now fill in the phone and address fields and click the 'Place your order' button.
The shipping method is already selected (Standard), and the name and phone fields are filled. Completing the address field is the final step before placing the order.
All necessary information has been provided, and the order summary is correct. The final step is to place the order by clicking the 'Place your order' button.
The task has been successfully completed with the order confirmation message displayed.
